entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Enable dynamic adaptive GC by default in Web SDK when PublishAot==true #33298
  • Add tests validating bundled Source Link #33297
  • `dotnet tool update` should mention the existing version along with the new version #33278

Closed

  • Specify all source-built dependencies and ensure they are regularly updated #27532

PullRequests

Created

  • Sequester UseArtifactsOutput logic in its own file #33310
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable dynamic adaptive GC by default in Web SDK when PublishAot==true #33309
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • Remove containerize binaries from packaging and layout for all non-windows-hosted builds #33307
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update .gitignore to ignore .env files #33305
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2202015 #33303
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #33300
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #33299
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix Source Link cross-targeting targets #33292
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #33290
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Do not look in root for .`config\dotnet-tools.json ` manifest for windows #33282
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Containers: add mappings for s390x and ppc64le platform architectures to corresponding rids. #33280
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Containers: Registry: support pulling from quay.io. #33266
    untriaged, Area-Containers

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #33248
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #33247
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.1xx #33215
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Fix R2R map generation on OSX #33225
    untriaged, Area-ReadyToRun
  • dotnet-watch: Enable nullable annotations on project level #32137
    untriaged
  • [Containers] Enable multi-RID and multi-project containerization #33166
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Add details command #31743
    untriaged
  • For templating#3553. Make search results downloads column optional #33024
    untriaged
